item.title: Data Flows
item.description: Now that functional and non-functional requirements are defined we will try to refine the flows.

item.title: Non Functional Requirements
item.description: In the MVP post, we detailed the functional goal of the minimum viable product. Now we will focus on the non-functional goals.

item.title: Minimum Viable Product
item.description: The MVP will be: “As a phone owner, I want to track my phone position over time.”
